special_text:
[i](Activate once each turn as a sorcery. When you're done dreaming, sacrifice this.)[/i]
When this Dream enters, mill three cards. Return a non-Dream permanent card in your graveyard to your hand.
{1}{G}: Level 2
Exile up to three target cards from graveyards. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.
{1}{G}: Level 3
Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
